elements.name: notifyIntroExplanation
elements.title:
This step will help you formally tell the people who need to know you are applying for a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName}.

Based on how you answered the questions, the type of Representation Grant you are applying for is called a: Grant of Administration Without Will Annexed.
  • You do not need to remember this term. It will automatically be written onto your court documents.

This step will create 2 PDF court documents for you:
  • You will give people the Form P1 to formally let them know you are applying for a Representation Grant.
  • You will then `swear or affirm` a Form P9 `affidavit` to confirm that you have actually given the P1 to people who should get it.

In previous steps, you have identified that there is no one, other than the applicant(s), entitled to notice in accordance to Rule 25-2.

Before moving on to the next step, please make sure that you have identified everyone who may be entitled to notice.

Sometimes people forget to include themselves while using this service. If you haven't included yourself yet, please go back and add information about yourself.
